name: Welcome Message
description: Welcome new users with a friendly greeting
body: Hello {name}! Welcome to our community. We're excited to have you here.
spintax_text: Hello {name}! {Welcome|Greetings|Hi there}! We're {excited|thrilled|happy} to have you here.
ab_variants: Hello {name}! Welcome to our community. We're excited to have you here.;Hi {name}! Thanks for joining us. We're thrilled to have you here.;Welcome {name}! We're happy to have you join our community.

name: Product Launch
body: üöÄ Exciting news! We're launching {product_name} on {launch_date}. Get early access now!
spintax_text: üöÄ {Exciting|Amazing|Incredible} news! We're launching {product_name} on {launch_date}. {Get early access now!|Don't miss out!|Be the first to try it!}
ab_variants: üöÄ Exciting news! We're launching {product_name} on {launch_date}. Get early access now!;üéâ Amazing news! We're launching {product_name} on {launch_date}. Don't miss out!;‚≠ê Incredible news! We're launching {product_name} on {launch_date}. Be the first to try it!

name: Follow-up Message
description: Follow up with users after initial contact
spintax_text: I wanted to follow up on our conversation about {topic}. Do you have any questions?
message_type: I {wanted|hope} to follow up on our conversation about {topic}. {Do you have any questions?|Let me know if you need anything!|Feel free to reach out!}
use_ab_testing: Hi {name}, I wanted to follow up on our conversation about {topic}. Do you have any questions?;Hi {name}, I hope to follow up on our conversation about {topic}. Let me know if you need anything!;Hi {name}, I wanted to follow up on our conversation about {topic}. Feel free to reach out!
column17: Template for following up with users

name: Event Invitation
body: You're invited to {event_name} on {event_date} at {event_location}. RSVP now!
spintax_text: You're {invited|welcome} to {event_name} on {event_date} at {event_location}. {RSVP now!|Don't miss it!|Join us!}
ab_variants: You're invited to {event_name} on {event_date} at {event_location}. RSVP now!;You're welcome to {event_name} on {event_date} at {event_location}. Don't miss it!;You're invited to {event_name} on {event_date} at {event_location}. Join us!

name: Thank You Message
body: Thank you {name} for your {support|help|contribution}! We really appreciate it.
spintax_text: Thank you {name} for your {support|help|contribution}! We {really|truly|sincerely} appreciate it.
ab_variants: Thank you {name} for your support! We really appreciate it.;Thank you {name} for your help! We truly appreciate it.;Thank you {name} for your contribution! We sincerely appreciate it.
